net.joala.condition.timing

Class SimpleSelfDescribing

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.joala.condition.timing.SimpleSelfDescribing
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.hamcrest.SelfDescribing
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractExpression

    public abstract class SimpleSelfDescribing
extends Object
implements org.hamcrest.SelfDescribing

    A self describing object. Adds a given string as plain text to a provided description object.
